name: frontend-image-encode
description: This is script and implementation of frontend image compression, convert, rotate, resize based on codecs in [Google/Squoosh](https://github.com/GoogleChromeLabs/squoosh). All codecs are copy from the Squoosh repo without modifying. if you want to pre-process images before uploading them to the server, please use this repo for reference ## Usage
author: thangman22
